name: TheHappyPlace - Errata
description:
Latest 8/15/2019 - lights finally built. adjusted landscape material scaling. updated palm tree UV mappings.

A note on controls: Ctrl mouse wheel will shift your camera. (feature not available on controller).
C will make you sneak. (controller right stick button)

I'm not sure weather the contest entry can be updated past the submission time, so I created a new project to showcase what the actual game was supposed to be - maybe will be one day. let's consider this an Alpha still.

The game is a psychological take on Spoon Theory and making everything count - even your most basic actions.

A very unfinished game, unfortunately. All assets created in the last 5 days, except Mr Mannequin.

Lights are still NOT built, causing artifacts, it's been cooking lights since 1 hour before the end of the contest, go figure.
